review: First off, I've cut the cable 4 years ago and have used many other devices. Mostly Roku. The fire stick is OK. I like the layout. But it has issues with keeping connected to my wireless network. It sits about 5 feet from the router and for some reason it just slows down to a crawl and everything starts to buffer. So I have to restart the device then it starts to work OK again for a while. The Roku LT that it replaced never had any issue like that. Maybe I just got a bad one, IDK. But if it keep up I will probably just go out and get another Roku.
